item.title: RetinaGAN
item.description: High-Fidelity Diabetic Retina Fundus Image Synthesis from Freestyle Lesion Maps Retina fundus imaging for diagnosing Diabetic Retinopathy (DR) is an efficient and patient-friendly modality, where many high-resolution images can be easily obtained for accurate diagnosis.
